author: govoni
body:
Tested compiling and pushed in CMSSW_8_0_X_2015-10-25-2300.
Tested running in CMSSW_7_1_14 with available samples.
Might need a review of  SimDataFormats/GeneratorProducts/src/classes_def.xml, as I simply followed the instructions I got from scram b to let it compile.
title: new dataformat for MC weights, slimmed wrt the LHEEventProduct one
